reviews.review_msg: This class is absolutely ridiculous.  DO NOT TAKE IT ONLINE!!!! When you ask him a question he does not get back to you very quickly, sometimes it takes days to hear a response.  This class is very hard, it is not an introductary class like the title says.  If this class is not mandatory, do not take it.

he is amazing, i've never seen a prof like him! he really cares about students, take to him if you have any problem about the course or midterms and he'll be more than happy to help. again if you wanna an A in kin 140, take it with him.

Wonderful wonderful prof...I have no bad things to say about him, I absolutely loved him! As long as you pay attention to the class and study for exams (read textbook to understand, not simply to memorize) you will do well in his class!

This class requires more work than I imagined - you definitely have to work hard to get that A. Lectures are really not mandatory since vineet reads everything from the powerpoint notes. Mid-terms are fair but final was very brutal, he expects us to finish a 3-hr exam in 2 hrs.

Reading everything off the powerpoint slides and doesn't speak clearly sometimes. He's not as funny as what people claimed, which doesn't really help because it's 8:30 lecture. Not really a GPA booster because you REALLY have to work hard for that A.
I dont know why I didnt like him!!!

Vineet!!!!!!! This guy is amazing!  He's hilarious, keeps you listening, he enjoys profanity, he is animated, loud and somehow manages to teach the class a ton of stuff without u even realizing it.  I'll take any course this proff offers at SFU.
he likes a lot of detail. but overall his teaching style is really good. his examples are really clear and based on real life situations. love this man!
Very good teacher.  Great personality, makes class fun and interesting.  Tests are very fair.  Will definately take another course with him.

Vineet is one of the best profs I have ever had, he made lectures so interesting! His exams are straightforward and he is always willing to help out-He always makes a point to get to know his students -One of the nicest profs I have encountered in my four years of post secondary.
this guy is just one of the nicest guys ull ever meet. he really cares about the students. holds extra tutorials even for just 5 ppl. he's a funny guy and makes u want to continue on in kines!

He's a very funny guy, he makes going to class actually interesting and has a great personality. Vineet gives good advice and he will hold extra study sessions outside of class before tests.  He actually makes an effort to learn your name.  However, he is kind of anal about cell phones in class, which is reasonable in his perspective.

Vineet is the most amazing teacher/TA i've ever had at SFU.  He takes the time to get to know his students and encourages interaction and good study habits without being too imposing.  Great sense of humour - I actually looked forward to 8:30 am friday labs!
